attributes.action: Prevent the closure of West Hampstead Police Station and Stables
attributes.background: The Met Police are considering closing down West Hampstead Police Station, this would reduce the ability of the Met to be part of the community and would mean that a horse named in honour of one of our contries longest serving Priministers (Gladstone) would be moved to where the PM had no conection

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
